how_to_get_pcloud_urls: 2. Right-click the video file and select 'Get public link'
3. Copy the sharing URL that looks like: https://e.pcloud.link/publink/show?code=XYZ
4. Use this URL directly in the videoUrl field above
5. The filename field is now just for reference/fallback
_instructions.for_local_development: If videoUrl is not provided, the app will fallback to ./videos/filename for local development
_instructions.github_pages_deployment: Make sure your GitHub Pages is enabled and using GitHub Actions for deployment
